name: 2D Platformer (ArifI21)
description:
This is a 2D Platformer game, where the aim is to complete the 3 levels by collecting all the coins. There are enemies and jumps that the player will have to overcome to be able to complete the game. As the game progresses, the level has more coins and the difficulty is increased.

Use the WASD or arrow keys to move and the space bar to jump. You can restart a level at any point by pressing R.

I hope you enjoy playing the game!
